citeulike_paper.title: Modeling User Search Behavior
citeulike_paper.abstract: Web usage mining is a main research area in Web mining focused on learning about Web users and their interactions with Web sites. Main challenges in Web usage mining are the application of data mining techniques to Web data in an efficient way and the discovery of non trivial user behaviour patterns. In this paper we focus the attention on search engines analyzing query log data and showing several models about how users search and how users use search engine results.

source.title: In Proceedings of the Third Latin American Web Congress (2005), doi:10.1109/LAWEB.2005.23ￂﾠ Key: citeulike:1542254
